painting-services.title: Painting Services
painting-services.shortDescription: Professional interior and exterior painting services for Darwin homes and businesses
painting-services.longDescription: Our professional painting services transform your spaces with precision and care. We use premium quality paints and finishes designed specifically for Darwin's tropical climate. Whether you need interior refresh or complete exterior restoration, our team delivers exceptional results that last.

process.title: Free Consultation
process.description: We'll visit your property to assess your painting needs and provide expert recommendations

process.title: Color Selection
process.description: Choose from our extensive color palette with professional guidance

process.title: Surface Preparation
process.description: Thorough cleaning, sanding, and priming for optimal paint adhesion

process.title: Professional Application
process.description: Expert application using premium tools and techniques

process.title: Final Inspection
process.description: Complete walkthrough to ensure your complete satisfaction

faq.question: What type of paint do you use?
faq.answer: We use premium quality paints specifically formulated for Darwin's tropical climate, including UV-resistant and moisture-resistant options.

faq.question: Do you provide color consultation?
faq.answer: Yes, our experts provide free color consultation to help you choose the perfect colors for your space.

faq.question: How long does a typical painting project take?
faq.answer: Most interior rooms take 1-2 days, while exterior projects typically take 2-3 days depending on weather conditions and project size.

home-renovations.title: Home Renovations
home-renovations.shortDescription: Complete home renovation services from kitchen to bathroom makeovers
home-renovations.longDescription: Transform your entire home with our comprehensive renovation services. From kitchen and bathroom makeovers to complete home transformations, we handle every aspect of your renovation project. Our experienced team coordinates all trades to deliver stunning results that enhance your lifestyle and property value.

process.title: Initial Consultation
process.description: Discuss your vision, budget, and timeline with our renovation specialists

process.title: Design & Planning
process.description: Create detailed plans and 3D renderings of your new space

process.title: Permits & Approvals
process.description: Handle all necessary permits and council approvals

process.title: Construction
process.description: Professional construction with daily progress updates

process.title: Final Handover
process.description: Complete inspection and handover of your beautifully renovated home

faq.question: Do you handle all permits and approvals?
faq.answer: Yes, we handle all necessary permits and council approvals as part of our comprehensive service.

faq.question: Can I live in my home during renovations?
faq.answer: In most cases, yes. We work to minimize disruption and can stage the renovation to allow continued occupancy.

faq.question: Do you provide 3D design visualizations?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide detailed 3D renderings so you can see exactly how your renovated space will look before construction begins.

electrical-services.title: Electrical Services
electrical-services.shortDescription: Licensed electrical work for homes and small businesses
electrical-services.longDescription: Our licensed electricians provide comprehensive electrical services for homes and small businesses across Darwin. From new installations and upgrades to safety inspections and emergency repairs, we ensure all work meets the highest safety standards and complies with current regulations.

process.title: Safety Assessment
process.description: Comprehensive safety inspection of your electrical system

process.title: Quote & Planning
process.description: Detailed quote and project planning with transparent pricing

process.title: Professional Installation
process.description: Licensed electricians perform all work to Australian standards

process.title: Testing & Certification
process.description: Complete testing and provision of compliance certificates

process.title: Safety Briefing
process.description: Explanation of your new electrical system and safety features

faq.question: Are your electricians licensed?
faq.answer: Yes, all our electricians are fully licensed and insured, with regular training to stay current with regulations.

faq.question: Do you provide compliance certificates?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide compliance certificates for all electrical work as required by law.

faq.question: Do you offer emergency electrical services?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide 24/7 emergency electrical services for urgent situations.

air-conditioning.title: Air Conditioning
air-conditioning.shortDescription: Stay cool in Darwin's heat with professional AC services
air-conditioning.longDescription: Beat Darwin's tropical heat with our professional air conditioning services. We specialize in installation, maintenance, and repair of split systems and ducted air conditioning. Our energy-efficient solutions are specifically chosen for Darwin's climate, ensuring optimal cooling while keeping running costs low.

process.title: Climate Assessment
process.description: Evaluate your space and cooling requirements for optimal system selection

process.title: System Selection
process.description: Choose from our range of energy-efficient air conditioning systems

process.title: Professional Installation
process.description: Expert installation by certified technicians with minimal disruption

process.title: Testing & Commissioning
process.description: Complete system testing and optimization for peak performance

process.title: Maintenance Plan
process.description: Set up regular maintenance schedule to ensure long-term efficiency

faq.question: What brands do you install?
faq.answer: We install leading brands including Daikin, Mitsubishi, Fujitsu, and Panasonic, chosen for reliability and efficiency in Darwin's climate.

faq.question: How often should I service my AC?
faq.answer: We recommend servicing every 6 months in Darwin's climate to maintain optimal performance and efficiency.

faq.question: Do you provide emergency repairs?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer 24/7 emergency repair services to keep you cool when you need it most.
